Notes on PLT Redex

Dec 31, 2020

Here’s one slides I gave in our group.

And I recommend several places to get you familiar with it.

Tutorials

  • Redex Doc(short tutorial + long tutorial)
  • An Introduction to Redex with Abstracting Abstract Machines by David Van Horn
  • Experimenting with Languages in Redex by William J. Bowman

Paper

  • Automated Testing for Operational Semantics from Burke Fetscher

Videos

  • OPLSS Talks by David Van Horn

Books

  • Semantics Engineering with PLT Redex

Courses

  • CPSC 539B – Compiler Theory by William J. Bowman
  • CMSC631 Program Analysis and Understanding by David Van Horn

Examples

  • racket/redex repo

Others

  • PLT Redex FAQ

Notes

Evaluation context has been heavily used in PLT Redex examples. Some links below may help.
